schools.name: Elmwood Elementary School
schools.school-summary: Elmwood Elementary School, a public school located in Elmwood, IL, serves grades PK-6 in the Elmwood Community Unit School District 322.It has received a GreatSchools Rating of 8 out of 10, based on a variety of school quality measures.
schools.rating-description: The GreatSchools Rating helps parents compare schools within a state based on a variety of school quality indicators and provides a helpful picture of how effectively each school serves all of its students. Ratings are on a scale of 1 (below average) to 10 (above average) and can include test scores, college readiness, academic progress, advanced courses, equity, discipline and attendance data. We also advise parents to visit schools, consider other information on school performance and programs, and consider family needs as part of the school selection process.

schools.name: Elmwood Junior High School
schools.school-summary: Elmwood Junior High School, a public school located in Elmwood, IL, serves grades 7-8 in the Elmwood Community Unit School District 322.It has received a GreatSchools Rating of 4 out of 10, based on a variety of school quality measures.

schools.name: Elmwood High School
schools.school-summary: Elmwood High School, a public school located in Elmwood, IL, serves grades 9-12 in the Elmwood Community Unit School District 322.It has received a GreatSchools Rating of 5 out of 10, based on a variety of school quality measures.
